title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Ranger-led Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger-led Activities               Ranger-led Activities       Explore Obed with a Park Ranger    Ranger-led programs give visitors the opportunity to explore the wonders of the park with a ranger. Programs are offered in spring, summer, and fall. Discover the many stories of Obed's past, take a walk to impressive overlooks, or learn about the many animals and plants that thrive at Obed Wild and Scenic River.    All ranger-led programs are free. Call the visitor center at 423-346-6294 for the latest time, place, and subject.          2016 RANGER-LED ACTIVITIES  DOWNLOAD     Spring/Summer: May 28-September 5    Click Here     Fall/Winter: September 6-May 30    Click Here     SPECIAL REQUEST PROGRAMS Schedule permitting, park rangers are available for on-site special request programs and off-site presentations for school groups, civic organizations and other local groups.  For information and scheduling, please contact the Environmental Education and Outreach Coordinator at 423-286-9059 ext. 29.       Park rangers instruct novice climbers on the fundamentals of rock climbing during a Climb With a Ranger program.
